data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 6,056 believers living in Ústecký, Czechia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ústecký, Czechia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 6,056 believers find a person of peace today among the 815,444 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ústecký, Czechia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,056 believers in Ústecký, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mongol, Khalka people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Ústecký.
Lord, the believers in the state of Ústecký, Czechia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 821,500 citizens of Ústecký, Czechia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
